channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Judge dismisses corruption case against New York City Mayor Eric Adams
item.description: A federal judge has dismissed New York City Mayor Eric Adams’ corruption case. Judge Dale E. Ho on Wednesday granted the Justice Department’s extraordinary request to set aside criminal charges so the mayor could aid President Donald Trump’s immigration crackdown.

item.title: After layoffs and funding problems, Head Start leaders fear what comes next
Forecasters warn of deadly floods and strong tornadoes in parts of the Midwest and South
